title: 30 minute leave penalty because my client has black screened twice tonight.
body: This is ridiculous. The client crashes upon entering champion select are just getting worse. Forcing your players to wait THIRTY MINUTES because of coding errors in YOUR product.. What kind of business model is that? If you can't isolate the issue to fix the problem, then turn off the leaver buster until it's been resolved. The players should not be punished for your own errors.

replies.body:
Disconnections from champ select negatively impact everyone in the lobby, regardless if the disconnection was intentional or not. This is one of the reasons why the system treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified. 

There are a number of potential causes for the issue you're seeing, however, the most common is an unstable connection to the servers. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions for this.

Please get back to me if you still encounter issues after working through the guide.

Ive been getting black screen as of 3  or 4 days ago. I cannot join games or spectate anymore.
Riot says problem is on my end apparently. Lol.
